page.title: 19Sport and Recreation
page.content: Ickwell has many riding stables and there are walks and bridleways around the village and around the neighbouring village of Old Warden. On Ickwell green there is a cricket square and a club.The cricket club has been run since the last century with 40 playing members,200 social members and 35 under 15s. The club plays matches at weekends and occasional charity matches.A traditional August bank holiday fixture is played between the club and neighbouring village of Old Warden. Football is played on the green as well .Teams play weekly in leagues. Old Warden too has its own cricket club and ground.Yoga is held in Ickwell_Bury and is open for people to join,places to visit include the Shuttleworth collection,Swiss Gardens and many historical buildings.
